text: وَأُدْخِلَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ جَنَّـٰتٍ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِمْ ۖ تَحِيَّتُهُمْ فِيهَا سَلَـٰمٌ

translation.en.sahih: And those who believed and did righteous deeds will be admitted to gardens beneath which rivers flow, abiding eternally therein by permission of their Lord; and their greeting therein will be, "Peace!"
translation.id.indonesian: Dan dimasukkanlah orang-orang yang beriman dan beramal saleh ke dalam surga yang mengalir di bawahnya sungai-sungai, mereka kekal di dalamnya dengan seizin Tuhan mereka. Ucapan penghormatan mereka dalam surga itu ialah "salaam".
